"The Cartridge which Enjoys the Konami Games 10 Times"}}in Japan, is a special [[cheat cartridge]] specifically designed for [[Konami]] games on the [[MSX]]. It allowed the player to start at different stages, with more lives, save the game's progress and high scores, make screen dumps, and play in slow motion, as well as other uses.
